file_content_changes:
@@ -168,10 +168,10 @@ jobs:
 
           if [ -n "$ARTIFACT_URL" ]; then
             echo "Downloading artifact: $ARTIFACT_URL"
-            curl --location --remote-header-name --remote-name -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" "$ARTIFACT_URL"
+            curl --location --remote-header-name --remote-name -H "Authorization: token $GITHUB_TOKEN" -o reference.zip "$ARTIFACT_URL"
             # Print the size of the downloaded artifact
-            echo "Artifact size (stat): $(stat --printf="%s bytes" artifacts.zip)"
-            echo "Artifact size (du): $(du -sh artifacts.zip)"
+            echo "Artifact size (stat): $(stat --printf="%s bytes" reference.zip)"
+            echo "Artifact size (du): $(du -sh reference.zip)"
           else
             echo "No artifact found with the name: $ARTIFACT_NAME"
           fi
